General.Name: Shanghai Join Buy Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Join Buy Co.,Ltd. operates department stores in China. It is also involved in the commercial retail operations; and provision of washing chemical products and washing services. The company was founded in 1939 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: 14th Floor, Dongzhan Commercial Building, Shanghai, China

1.Name: Mr. Yin  Xishan
1.Title: Director, CFO, Deputy GM & Financial Director
